 I found an old link which was asking how to pronounce
the castle  for Fujii Kogen.

  The castle is called "Shoreizan". This is the actual
way to pronounce its name. 

 
 Also, if interested, I have one picture of it.

  I don't know if anyone cares about that anymore, but
I figured I'd answer that question anyway.
